content: I think I'll try to incorporate some of those core exercises into my routine, especially the plank and Russian twists. I've heard that planks are really effective for building core strength. I'll also try to do some glute-strengthening exercises to improve my overall lower body strength. By the way, I was thinking of setting a goal to do a 30-minute jog without stopping by the end of the month. Do you think that's a realistic goal, considering I've been doing 30-minute jogs three times a week for the past month?
